content:
Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 44, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft polished_blackstone_slab, I need to place 3 polished_blackstone side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the polished_blackstone from slot 13 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 44, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: Since the polished_blackstone has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another polished_blackstone to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the polished_blackstone to slot 2.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 44, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: Since the polished_blackstone has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another polished_blackstone to the right of it. Slot 3 is to the right of slot 2, and therefore I will move the polished_blackstone to slot 3.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 20, "index": 28}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 44, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the polished_blackstone_slab by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
